statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs;
SELECT worker_name, training_program FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, worker_name, training_program FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT id, certification FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE worker_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE certification IS NOT NULL ORDER BY worker_name DESC;
SELECT id, worker_name, skill_level FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT worker_name, training_program FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE certification = 'CPR Certification' ORDER BY training_program ASC;
SELECT id, worker_name, certification FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE skill_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY certification DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_worker_training_programs WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner' AND certification IS NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_worker WHERE certification_status = TRUE
SELECT name, profession FROM health_worker WHERE worker_id = 2
SELECT * FROM training_program WHERE duration_in_hours > 50
SELECT program_name, training_provider FROM training_program WHERE program_id = 1
SELECT profession, name FROM health_worker
SELECT * FROM health_worker WHERE certification_status = TRUE ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, profession FROM health_worker WHERE profession = 'Doctor' AND certification_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM training_program WHERE duration_in_hours > 100 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, training_provider FROM training_program WHERE training_provider IN ('ABC Company', 'XYZ Institute');
SELECT worker_id, name, profession FROM health_worker WHERE profession LIKE '%Nurse%' OR profession LIKE '%Therapist%';
SELECT name, profession FROM healthcare_worker WHERE certification_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM training_program WHERE duration_in_weeks < 10;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM training_program WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT certification_name, organization, validity_period_in_years FROM certification WHERE cerf_id = 1;
SELECT id, name, profession, certification_level FROM healthcare_worker WHERE profession = 'Doctor';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_worker WHERE profession='Doctor';
SELECT name, profession FROM healthcare_worker ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_program WHERE duration_in_weeks > 12;
SELECT certification_name, organization FROM certification WHERE validity_period_in_years >= 5;
SELECT h.name, c.certification_name FROM healthcare_worker h JOIN certification c ON h.certification_level = c.cerf_id;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_worker;
SELECT name, role, organization FROM healthcare_worker WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT wc.issue_date, c.certification_name FROM worker_certification wc JOIN certification c ON wc.certification_id = c.certification_id;
SELECT tw.name, cp.program_name FROM training_program cp JOIN healthcare_worker tw ON cp.training_provider = tw.organization;
SELECT * FROM certification WHERE renewal_period > 1;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_worker WHERE certification_status = True;
SELECT name, role FROM healthcare_worker WHERE organization = 'Hospital ABC';
SELECT * FROM certification WHERE renewal_period > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT issuing_organization FROM certification;
SELECT program_name, duration, training_provider FROM training_program WHERE duration >= 30;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_workers
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, qualification FROM healthcare_workers
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM worker_certifications WHERE worker_id = 1
SELECT program_name, duration_in_months FROM training_programs ORDER BY duration_in_months DESC
SELECT worker_id, program_id, module_id FROM worker_training WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL LIMIT 5
SELECT worker_name, qualification, certification_date FROM healthcare_workers ORDER BY worker_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, duration_in_months FROM training_programs WHERE duration_in_months > 6;
SELECT worker_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM healthcare_workers JOIN worker_certifications ON healthcare_workers.worker_id = worker_certifications.worker_id;

SELECT program_name, module_name, completion_date FROM training_programs JOIN program_modules ON training_programs.program_id = program_modules.program_id JOIN worker_training ON program_modules.module_id = worker_training.module_id;

SELECT worker_name, qualification, program_name, completion_date FROM healthcare_workers JOIN worker_training ON healthcare_workers.worker_id = worker_training.worker_id JOIN training_programs ON worker_training.program_id = training_programs.program_id ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
